parallel.distributed
Class DLock

java.lang.Object
  parallel.distributed.DLock
public class DLock
extends java.lang.Object

implements a distributed lock, valid across JVMs and across multiple threads in each JVM. Within a JVM, only a single lock can exist for each pair.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ioannis T. Christou

Method Summary
static DLock getInstance()

static DLock getInstance(java.lang.String host, int port)
          get the unique DLock object associated with the specific pair.
 void getLock()
          get a valid lock for all threads in this JVM, and all others that will
 void releaseLock()
          release the lock across all JVMs asking for a lock for the particular pair that this lock is associated with.
